thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Kira

author: Kira
title: Kira
text: I enquired about my cruise through cruisesalefinder.com and had an email back telling me my chosen cabin was available within the hour. As it was a pack n go fare I had until 5pm the following day to pay for my cruise but my bank transfer didn't clear in time! Anthony extended my cut off time by 24 hours and when my money cleared I was able to pay for my cruise about 9pm that night! Now we are all booked in ready to go, looking forward to our first cruise in April to celebrate our 5th wedding anniversary.
